Lio looks at the lion as it lies on its side not moving. "Do not mock what 
you do not understand and Sometimes lion got to do what a Lion got to do even 
if it means being reckless." Lio Brings up his wrapping them around Darks 
torso and trying to pull down.

Dark Gets slammed on his back "what in the"

Lio Flips to his feet "Keyura Come to my hand."

As the black case in Lio chamber starts to resounding at burst open as a 
stream of blue metal shoots out ripping through the chamber door and all 
others that stand in its way. 

As it reaches Lio it turns in to a long sword with a white small narrow blade 
in the center while the around that the rest burned blue and moved like a 
mystic fire.

Lio takes an attack stance gestures for dark to bring it on "Lets give this 
one more round. I not giving up"

Dark rises to his feet "next time I strike you there will be nothing let but 
stinking metal."

Lio looks back then bring it on

Dark starts to gather energy as he creates to massive sized plasma balls and 
launches them at Lio.

Lio braces himself digging his claws into the ground as he swings the sword 
to connect with the energy balls.

As the energy weapons battle the energy flux seems to rise getting higher as 
the energy in the weapons cause extreme bright flashes of light releasing 
massive amounts of  energy into the air. There is an explosion kicking up 
dust and up rooting a few trees.

Dark Laughs coldly "My win."
